front.title: E.164 to MetaData (E2MD) Dynamic Delegation Discovery System (DDDS) Application

abstract.t: This document proposes a new Dynamic Delegation Discovery System(DDDS) Application to map E.164 numbers to metadata.It discusses the use of the Domain Name System (DNS) for resolvingE.164 numbers into metadata to provide information about E.164numbers in cases where E.164 Number to URI Mapping (ENUM) can not beused.
